items.sentence: I wonder whether Tom could be persuaded to teach my children French.
Tom said that he didn't think Mary had studied French for very long.
Tom said he wanted to be able to speak French like a native speaker.
Tom said he didn't think that Mary had studied French for very long.
Tom said that he didn't know whether Mary could speak French or not.
I should've told Tom that I didn't want to go to Australia with him.
I plan on going to Australia whether Tom wants to go with me or not.
I hope that I have an opportunity to meet Tom when I'm in Australia.
I don't think that Tom is going to want to go to Australia with you.
Everyone thought that Tom was going to be in Australia this weekend.
